item.description: Join Cheryl Bond for an introduction to Improving Relationships! Improving relationships is about understanding yourself and others.  Period.  When you are truly engaged in a situation and honestly trying to understand others, you will make progress.  A fundamental understanding of how we create our experience of life in the moment is the key to engagement and authentic connection.  It’s also the path to collaboration, synergy, and new ideas. This course will challenge participants to take a closer look at how they interpret other people and situations, and how those perceptions affect their ability to find a meeting of the minds and work things out. See for yourself that it is possible to work productively with any person in any situation!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: FREE Intro to Improving Relationships
